nodes.text: Trron Selus was a male soldier in the Republic Army who served as a battle coordinator at Outpost Victory, a stronghold of the Balmorran resistance during the Cold War. Selus was among the casualties when the Sith Empire sacked the outpost.

Trron Selus appears as a named Champion enemy in Outpost Victory during the Heroic misison "Firestar," which can be completed by Imperial players on Balmorrain the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
